name: Ayesha Rahman
quote: The transparency in how donations are used gave me confidence to contribute regularly.

name: Jamil Hossain
quote: The winter coat my family received literally saved us during the cold wave.

name: Priya Saha
quote: Distributing warm clothes to remote villages was the most rewarding experience of my life.

name: Dr. Rezwan Khan
quote: This initiative reduced cold-related illnesses by 40% in our community last winter.

name: Nusrat Jahan
quote: My students can now focus on studies instead of shivering in cold classrooms.

name: Rafiqul Islam
quote: Proud to sponsor 50 blankets - seeing the direct impact motivates me to do more.
